equal_temperament_12.name: 12-TET (Equal Temperament)
equal_temperament_12.notes: Most common. Each semitone is exactly 100 cents.

rule_of_18.name: Rule of 18 (Historical)
rule_of_18.notes: Pre-1900s method. Produces slight sharpness at higher frets.

pythagorean.name: Pythagorean Temperament
pythagorean.notes: Perfect fifths, wolf intervals. Rarely used on guitar.
